game.name: King Defender
game.description:
Let your creative and innovative mind bring into action in this one of the best adventure games for boys. The royal family is surrounded by dangerous enemies. And, you have given the responsibility of protecting the king and queen against the evil powers. In this brand new platform game, you will see the scroll areas over them you will have to roll the mouse to scroll the landscape. Make sure to collect the building blocks to prepare the best possible stable castle. 

Click the button given the right side of the screen when your castle is ready. Completing the task is a quite difficult job. However, your attentiveness and focus will definitely help you to protect the royal family and win in this free online puzzle game â€“ King Defender. Try to hide them properly so that no enemy can spot them. Play this cool king game by keeping your mouse over the borders in order to scroll through the landscape. 

Check out the toolbar given at the bottom of the screen and click and drag the building blocks from there to create a stable castle. This is something that could help to save the king and queen from the incoming siege. Click Start Siege to check your final outcome once you build the castle. Choose any out of the low, medium and high quality before beginning this free online platform game. You can also mute the sound if you want to enjoy it without music. Good luck to having a blast in this royal family games!
